column4: Anybody can help me with loadlin and installing Ubuntu 6.06?  I get a kernel-panic about unable to mount root fs on unknown-block.  I have root=/dev/rd/0
It seems that the device you are pointing to with boot= doesn't exist... make sure you have the correct device name
what is /dev/rd/0 ?  I am trying to use a ramdisk.
Not sure about ramdisks, but it seems that /dev/rd/0 doesn't exist.. or atleast the ramdisk doesn't contain a kernel
